= Running from Eclipse =

Use "External tool" launch config.

== Seismap Jetty run config ==

*Location:*
c:\path\to\apache-maven-2.2.1\bin\mvn.bat

*Working dir:*
${workspace_loc:/seismap}

*Arguments:*
jetty:run

*Environment:*

MAVEN_OPTS=-Dseismap.base.dir=${project_loc:seismap} -Xdebug -Xnoagent -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,address=4000,server=y,suspend=n

PATH=${env_var:PATH}(#)
(#) No need it? ;C:\workspaces\seismap\trunk\src\main\mapserver\dlll



== Seismap Jetty stop config ==

*Location:*
c:\path\to\apache-maven-2.2.1\bin\mvn.bat

*Working dir:*
${workspace_loc:/seismap}

*Arguments:*
jetty:stop
